Package biz.aduna.map.cluster

Interface Summary
Classification A Classification is a named set of objects.
Cluster A Cluster groups a set of Objects that have the exact same Classification memberships out of a given set of Classifications.
ClusterMap The ClusterMap interface defines the methods needed to generate a cluster map visualisation of a ClusterModel.
ClusterMapConstants ClusterMapConstants defines the symbolic keys and some symbolic values that can be used to configure the properties of a ClusterMap.
ClusterMapListener ClusterMapListeners are notified by a ClusterMap when its state changes, as a direct result of a method invocation on the ClusterMap.
ClusterMapMediator A ClusterMapMediator is a building block for constructing a GUI around a ClusterMap.
ClusterMapMediatorListener ClusterMapMediatorListeners are notified by a ClusterMapMediator when its state changes, as a direct result of a method invocation on the ClusterMapMediator.
ClusterMapUIConstants ClusterMapUIConstants defines the symbolic keys and some symbolic values that can be used to configure the properties of the components created and managed by a ClusterMapMediator.
ClusterModel A ClusterModel contains a set of Clusters that is calculated based on a set of Classifications.
IconFactory An IconFactory is used by a ClusterMap to retrieve Images that it will use to represent certain objects in the visualisation.
XmlConstants XmlConstants defines the element and attribute names that are used in the XML serialization of a Classification hierarchy.
 

Class Summary
ClassificationTreeReader ClassificationTreeReader is a DocumentHandler capable of reconstructing a series of SAX 1.0 events (such as generated by a ClassificationTreeWriter or an XML parser reading an XML SAX file) back into a Classification tree.
ClassificationTreeWriter ClassificationTreeWriter serializes the contents of a hierarchy of Classifications containing Objects to an XML stream, using the SAX 1.0 API.
ClusterGraphPanel ClusterGraphPanel is a JPanel derivative that displays the contents of a ClusterMap.
ClusterMapFactory A ClusterMapFactory is capable of producing a ClusterMap instance and instances of related classes.
ClusterMapGUI A ClusterMapGUI combines all components created and managed by a ClusterMapMediator in a single ready-to-use GUI.
ClusterMapViewer ClusterMapViewer is a simple utility class whose main method opens a ClusterMapGUI in a JFrame.
DefaultClassification DefaultClassification provides a complete implementation of Classification.
DefaultCluster DefaultCluster provides a complete implementation of Cluster.
DefaultClusterModel DefaultClusterModel provides a complete implementation of ClusterModel.
DefaultObject DefaultObject provides a simple implementation of Objects that can be added to a Classification and/or Cluster.
